block.p: LEVINSON-Edmund. On October 9th, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Eva (nee Baehr). Loving father of Lawrence and Lynn. Cherished grandfather of Steven and Richard. Adored great grandfather of Jacob. Dear brother of Morton, Helen and Elanor. Eddie was a retired employee of The New York Times after over 40 years of service. Service to be held Wednesday, October 11th, 10 AM, at Garlick Funeral Home at 1439 Unionport Road, Bronx, NY. Burial at Cedar Park Cemetery, New Jersey. Sitting shiva at 2877 Harding Avenue, Bronx, New York, October 11-October 13.
